import React from'react';import'./Signup.css';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import axios from'axios';import useUserData from'../useUserData';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Signup(){const navigate=useNavigate();const{name,nickname,birth,id,password,store,setName,setNickname,setBirth,setId,setPassword,setStore,handleSave,fetchUserData}=useUserData();const handleSubmit=async event=>{event.preventDefault();if(name&&nickname&&birth&&id&&password&&store){const signupData={name,nickname,birth,id,password,store};try{// 회원가입 시 입력한 정보 전달 경로
